Row.Text: Likes civilizations that has the same government and hates civilizations that declare war.

Adding [ICON_RESOURCE_IRON] Iron to adjacent Mines with no resources after building Industrial Zones. Builders +ln(sum of all cities' [ICON_production] production)/ln(4) (max 5) build charges. After completing a building (except wonders), gain [Icon_Science] Science for 10% [ICON_Production] Production equal to the building. Monument +1 [ICON_Science] Science and +1 [ICON_Production] Production.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]May not build Holy Site districts, gain Great Prophets, gain [ICON_Faith] Faith, or found Religions.
+20% [ICON_GreatScientist] Great Scientist and [ICON_GreatEngineer] Great Engineer points. +1 Diplomatic government slot after unlocking "Class Struggle" Civic.

A district unique to Soviet Union. Replaces the Campus district and cheaper to build. Naukograd provide +2 [ICON_Production] Production for the adjacent Industrial Zone. Naukograd provides [ICON_Production] Production equal to its adjacent bonus.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_Science] Science. +2 [ICON_Science] Science from the adjacent Industrial Zone.

Soviet Union unique melee unit, cannot be purchase, base 15 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength and will increase with technologies.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when fighting in the home territory. +1 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength for every adjacent Red Army.
